name: Create Tree Structure

name: Edit Tree Structure
precondition: [{"insert": "The tree structure already exists, the user has logged into the Wiki system, and has editing permissions"}]

[{"insert": "Enters edit mode, displaying the current information of the tree structure"}]

[{"insert": "Modification successful, the tree structure is updated, and the new name is displayed in the list"}]

name: Post Comment

name: Verify user has space management permissions
precondition: [{"insert": "User is logged in and has space management permissions"}]

steps.expectedResult: [{"insert": "Successfully loads the space management page"}]
[{"insert": "New space created successfully, the page indicates creation success"}]
[{"insert": "Successfully saves permission settings, the page indicates save success"}]
[{"insert": "Space deleted successfully, the page indicates deletion success"}]

description: [{"insert": "[{"insert": "This test case is used to verify that a user can successfully create, edit, and delete spaces when they have space management permissions."}]

name: Verify user does not have space management permissions
precondition: [{"insert": "User is logged in and does not have space management permissions"}]

steps.expectedResult: [{"insert": "Displays a message indicating no permission to access"}]
[{"insert": "Informs the user they do not have permission to create a space"}]

description: [{"insert": "[{"insert": "This test case is used to verify that when a user does not have space management permissions, the system should correctly prompt for lack of access."}]
reviewRemark: Inconsistency or conflicts with logical relationships between other test cases

name: User Click Article Link Test
precondition: [{"insert": "User is logged in and on the Wiki homepage"}]

steps.step: [{"insert": "User selects an article on the homepage and clicks the article title"}]
steps.expectedResult: [{"insert": "The page successfully redirects to the detailed content of the selected article"}]

steps.step: [{"insert": "User views the title and content of the selected article"}]
steps.expectedResult: [{"insert": "The title and content of the article are displayed accurately"}]

description: [{"insert": "[{"insert": "Verify that the user can successfully navigate to the article page and view the content after clicking the article link"}]

name: User Edit Article Test

[{"insert": "The article page displays the updated content"}]

reviewRemark: The boundary definitions of the test case are not clear enough

name: User Share Article Function Test
precondition: [{"insert": "User has accessed and opened the article to share"}]

steps.step: [{"insert": "User selects a specific social media platform to share"}]
steps.expectedResult: [{"insert": "A share link is generated and the user is prompted that it has been successfully copied"}]

steps.step: [{"insert": "User pastes and sends the share content on social media"}]
steps.expectedResult: [{"insert": "Successfully publishes the share content on social media, and the link is valid"}]

description: [{"insert": "[{"insert": "Verify the user's ability to share an article in the Wiki system via social media platforms."}]

name: User Search Article Test
precondition: [{"insert": "User is on the homepage and has access to the search bar."}]

steps.step: [{"insert": "User types a keyword into the search bar and hits enter"}]
steps.expectedResult: [{"insert": "The system displays a list of articles related to the keyword"}]

steps.step: [{"insert": "User selects one of the articles from the search results"}]
steps.expectedResult: [{"insert": "The page redirects to the selected article with relevant content displayed"}]

description: [{"insert": "[{"insert": "Verify that the user can search for articles using keywords and view the relevant content."}]
